SocialDynamicsOfScience

Class Community

  • java.lang.Object
    • SocialDynamicsOfScience.Community
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISDoS

    public class Community
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISDoS
    Community - Community is a cluster of authors. There are three elements in the SDS model: papers, authors, and disciplines. It represents a social network among authors. The social network starts with one author writing one paper in one discipline. The network then evolves as new authors join, new papers are written, and new disciplines emerge over time.
    Version:
    V1.0 - Alpha
    Author:
    Kemal Akkoyun $ 11076004
    See Also:
    ISDoS
